channel.title: Can't start up server
channel.description: ok it says "Unable to start-up listener on 43594 --- Port already in use?? and then this pop up of Miss. silabsoft server console just pops up. what i do?

item.title: Can't start up server
item.dc:creator: @lordslayer565 lordslayer565
item.description:
@lordslayer565 wrote:

Do you have other server programs? like if you hit “start server” on the mopar client then try to run a diferent a difrent server it will give you that message just restart the mopar client then try.Or you can just change the port
go to your server files open up server.java (right click edit) then search for

43594

you should see

	public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; //43594=default

just change 43594 to anything you want but dont take out the ;
then compile then run if it says samething i dont know what to tell ya
(btw to log on the server you have to go to (on the server) file->new port
then enter what ever you changed 43594 to

Hope it helped =] if it dint srry =\

Read full topic
